Package net.demilich.metastone.game.spells.trigger

Class MinionSummonedTrigger

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.demilich.metastone.game.logic.CustomCloneable

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, HasDesc<EventTriggerDesc>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MinionPlayedTrigger
    public class MinionSummonedTrigger
extends AbstractSummonTrigger
    Fires whenever a minion is summoned. This occurs after the minion's enchantments have been put into play, but before its battlecry has been evaluated.
    See Also:
